mention.text: Sir Ernest Oppenheimer , a diamond merchant
Oppenheimer , who linked the diamond business with his extensive Anglo American Corp. gold-mining interests
the Central Selling Organization , London-based marketing arm of the De Beers diamond empire , controlled by the wealthy Oppenheimer family of South Africa
sharpest in the second half of the year , when sales fell 24 percent from the first six months
the second biggest diamond producer in terms of value
managing director of IDC Ltd. , an independent diamond distributor in London
the value of the world 's diamond production
`` the gem of gems , '' although millions of people own them
more of the industry 's millions of jobs relocated in their own countries
a complaint filed by the British mining company Consolidated Gold Fields PLC alleging anti-competitive practices
takeover bid from Oppenheimer-controlled Minorco SA last year
